name: Amara Johnson
experience: 15+ years directing intimate and emotionally powerful music videos
bio: A master of emotional storytelling, Amara Johnson creates deeply intimate and visually stunning R&B and Soul music videos. Her work is characterized by warm cinematography, romantic atmospheres, and a keen eye for capturing genuine human emotion and connection.

visual_style.description: Warm, intimate, and sensual visuals with emphasis on emotional connection and natural beauty. Creates romantic atmospheres with soft lighting, rich colors, and elegant compositions.

color_palette.mood: Warm, romantic, and sophisticated with rich earth tones

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Centered and balanced compositions with emphasis on the human form. Uses negative space elegantly.
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Prefers slower, more deliberate camera movements. Loves shallow depth of field to isolate subjects beautifully.

key_techniques: Soft key lighting with minimal fill
Backlighting for silhouettes and rim light
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Warm and flattering with soft shadows. Creates intimate, romantic atmosphere through controlled lighting.

editing_style.pace: Slow to medium, emotional and contemplative
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts follow the emotional flow and vocal phrasing rather than strict beats. Lingers on powerful moments.

storytelling.narrative_approach: Emotionally driven narratives about love, heartbreak, empowerment, and self-discovery. Strong focus on character and relationship development.
storytelling.performance_vs_broll_ratio: 60/40 (strong focus on artist performance with supportive narrative)
storytelling.symbolism_level: Medium - uses visual poetry but remains accessible

post_production.color_grading_style: Warm and rich with emphasis on skin tones. Often uses golden/amber LUTs with lifted shadows for a softer look.
post_production.vfx_approach: Minimal and subtle - prefers practical effects

key_priorities: Focus on emotional expressions and human connection
Emphasize beautiful, flattering lighting on performers
emphasis: CRITICAL: Maintain warm, flattering lighting in ALL performance scenes
Use slower camera movements that feel intentional and graceful
Create visual poetry that complements the soulful music
Emphasize the beauty and elegance of Black culture and aesthetics
